pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Veri Python ClientPython client for veri```shell scriptpip install veriservice``````pythonimport veriservice``````pythonservice = "localhost:5678"veriservice.init_service(service, "./tmp")client = veriservice.VeriClient(service, "example_data")data_conf = {}client.create_data_if_not_exists(data_conf)data = [ { 'label': 'a', 'feature': [0.5, 0.1, 0.2] }, { 'label': 'b', 'feature': [0.5, 0.1, 0.3] }, { 'label': 'c', 'feature': [0.5, 0.1, 1.4] }, ]for d in data: client.insert(d['feature'], d['label'].encode())result = client.search([[0.1, 0.1, 0.1]])for i in result: print(i)result = client.data()for i in result: print(i)```
